name: pixerve-integration-tests
description: Integration tests and usage examples for Pixerve image processing server

scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/test-runner.js all
scripts.test:basic: npm run build && node dist/test-runner.js basic
scripts.test:codec: npm run build && node dist/test-runner.js codec
scripts.test:backend: npm run build && node dist/test-runner.js backend
scripts.test:edge: npm run build && node dist/test-runner.js edge

author: Pixerve Team
